description: Large level inspired by E1M4-The Grisly Grotto, however with an abstract twist to its style, featuring somewhat cramped interiors, underwater and void sections. The map source is included.
notes: This map requires a source port with increased limits.
This file is actually a RAR archive, not ZIP.
Hosted at the author's homepage with a timestamp 2020-11-07. Only the readme file differs from the original.
title: Memories of a Grotto
